docs.text: MkDocs Template ¶ Welcome to the MkDocs Template Documentation. This is nothing more than a basic page to start using MkDocs! Getting started ¶ To start, clone the Repoitory (Click the "Use this template" button) and edit this file here. You can also just add new files and alter some settings. More can be found on the README.md Manual Deploy ¶ To manually deploy the sites from your local repository, use the gh-deploy command from MkDocs. Just make sure that you have set a GitHub repository in the mkdocs.yml to push towards.
docs.title: Welcome
